grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 忙殺【ボウサツ】being extremely busy, being swamped with work
忙殺される【ボウサツサレル】to be very busily occupied, to be swamped with work
煩忙【ハンボウ】pressure of business, busy
kun reading compounds: 忙しい【いそがしい】busy, occupied, hectic, restless, hurried, fidgety
忙しい【せわしい】busy, hectic, frantic, restless, hurried, fidgety
